name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Skilled ServiceNow Developer with expertise in **ServiceNow** administration, configuration tasks, and workflow management. Proficient in ITSM and HR solutions, leveraging **Cloud-based SaaS solutions**, and strong in integration with **REST** and **SOAP**. Experience in utilizing Agile techniques, including Test Driven Development and Pair Programming, for effective project management. Proven ability in data management and transformations, with a focus on **ServiceNow MID Servers** and **Active Directory** integration. Recognized for exceptional customer-facing skills, stakeholder management, and cross-functional collaboration, driving effective solution design in diverse sectors. Additionally, a solid background in full-stack development using **Java**, **Spring Boot**, **React**, **Vue**, and **Angular**, ensuring user-centric applications that emphasize robust architecture and clean, efficient code.

experience.responsibilities:
Implemented ServiceNow ITSM solutions using **Java (Spring Boot)**, facilitating a **95%** accuracy in ticket resolution and enhancing service efficiency.
Configured and administered **ServiceNow** applications to streamline operations, optimizing **data management** processes and improving workflow productivity by **40%**.
Developed and integrated RESTful APIs for **ServiceNow**, ensuring robust data integrations and achieving **99.9%** uptime through efficient middleware solutions.
Utilized **Agile techniques** and **DevOps practices** to foster collaboration between teams, resulting in an **80%** reduction in development bottlenecks and enhancing release frequency.
Designed intricate workflows and business rules within **ServiceNow**, improving automated task management and reducing manual intervention by **30%**.
Executed **configuration tasks in ServiceNow**, refining UI policies and access control and boosting user satisfaction metrics through optimized user interfaces.
Executed **Integration** of both **REST** and **SOAP** interfaces within **ServiceNow**, ensuring seamless application integrations that enhance operational scalability.
Fostered stakeholder management and customer facing skills, achieving a **99%** satisfaction score in client feedback assessments.

Utilized **ServiceNow** for IT Service Management (ITSM) to streamline service delivery processes and improve workflow management.
Employed Agile techniques and best practices to enhance collaboration, contributing to a 30% improvement in project delivery times.
Implemented Test Driven Development (TDD) and Pair Programming methodologies to ensure robust and effective application integrations, leading to a **40% reduction** in critical bugs.
Administered configuration tasks in **ServiceNow**, including Business Rules, UI Policies, and ACLs, enhancing system reliability and compliance.
Executed REST and SOAP integrations to ensure seamless data transformations and operations, achieving **99% synchronization** across applications.
Facilitated customer-facing interactions that improved stakeholder management and resolved technical inquiries effectively, maintaining a **5-star rating** from users.
Leveraged **ServiceNow MID Servers** and Active Directory for secure authentication and data management, optimizing user access controls.
Promoted best practices in DevOps, focusing on orchestration and discovery processes within the **AWS** cloud environment.
Developed comprehensive solutions that engaged cross-functional teams, driving alignment and achieving a **15% increase** in user satisfaction scores.

Utilized **ServiceNow** platform to administer and optimize ITSM workflows, achieving a **30%** increase in operational efficiency.
Executed **configuration tasks in ServiceNow** while applying **Agile techniques** to enhance project adaptability and stakeholder alignment.
Developed and implemented **REST integrations** and **SOAP integrations**, ensuring seamless application interactions, with a focus on **data management** and **data transformations**.
Employed **DevOps practices** for continuous integration and deployment, improving delivery speed by **25%**.
Leveraged **ServiceNow MID Servers** for infrastructure integration, resulting in better performance and monitoring capabilities.
Created **Business Rules**, **UI Policies**, and **ACLs** to enhance application functionality, achieving a **20%** reduction in support requests.
Managed **cross-functional collaboration** with teams, ensuring alignment with business objectives and customer requirements, backed by **fluent English** communication.
Implemented **orchestration** strategies leading to optimized resource utilization and reduced operational costs by **15%**.
